item.title: Rust API
item.description: Rust API # Yozuk is published as a Rust library, so it’s really easy to integrate it with your Rust application. yozuk - Core functionality. yozuk-sdk - Types and utilities for development. use yozuk::Yozuk; use yozuk_sdk::prelude::*; let tokens = Tokenizer::new().tokenize("generate uuid"); let zuk = Yozuk::builder().build(); let commands = zuk.get_commands(&tokens, &[]); if commands.is_empty() { println!("I can't understand your request."); } let result = zuk.run_commands(commands, &mut [], None); Features # default-skills - (default) Uses the default skillset.
